title: 2017 Athlete Collin Smith bursts onto the recruiting scene
text: 2017 Athlete Collin Smith bursts onto the recruiting scene PaPreps Staff Collin Smith , a 2017 athlete from Ligonier Valley (PA), received his first offer from Michigan this past Sunday. Smith announced the offer via his twitter account: Blessed to say I received an offer from The University of Michigan! #BIG10 #Wolverines pic.twitter.com/HoKFumwVTK - Collin Smith (@Collin17Smith) September 28, 2015 Up until Sunday, Smith had been receiving letters from Michigan and other schools that have been showing interest in him as an athlete. "I was asked to call Coach (Jim) Harbaugh on Sunday and that's when he offered me," said Smith. Smith plays both quarterback and safety for his high school team. In his most recent game, Smith's stat line reads as follows: 9 out of 13 passes completed for 188 yards and four touchdowns, 117 yards rushing and 2 rushing touchdowns. Obviously, Smith is no longer under the radar from a recruiting standpoint. Smith does have plans to head up to Ann Arbor, Michigan, at some point during this season.
